verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
All hail King Jesus
All hail Emmanuel
King of kings
Lord of lords
Bright Morning Star

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And throughout eternity
I'm going to praise Him
And forevermore
I will reign with Him
